activities.name: Exodus Siege
activities.description: The Fallen prepare to attack Failsafe's mainframe aboard the Exodus Black.

activities.name: Hack the Planet
activities.description: Ghost has a plan to interface with the Nessus core. But he'll need Failsafe's help.

activities.name: Deep Conversation
activities.description: Failsafe has a plan to retrieve Vex data. But she'll need Ghost's help.

activities.name: Unbreakable
activities.description: Failsafe has caught wind of Vex tech that could result in unstoppable barriers.

activities.name: Invitation from the Emperor
activities.description: Cayde's worried about a mysterious message drawing the Red Legion to a remote corner of Nessus.

activities.name: Lost Crew
activities.description: Help Failsafe find two long-lost members of her crew.

activities.name: Release
activities.description: The Vex appear to be capturing the Fallen, and Failsafe wants it stopped.

activities.name: O' Captain
activities.description: - N/A -

activities.name: Altars of Summoning
activities.description: Hidden within the Court of Savathûn are the Altars of Summoning, a hidden oubliette where Savathûn, the Witch Queen has imprisoned large amounts of powerful creatures for future use. Following her posthumous direction, her Ghost Immaru directs the Vanguard into the oubliette, so that they can slay the beings within as tribute for Eris Morn, God of Vengeance.

activities.name: Astral Alignment
activities.description: Reawaken the Ley Lines around the Dreaming City and push back the armies of Xivu Arath.

activities.name: Altars of Sorrow
activities.description:
Prevent the Hive from gaining Darkness
Essence through the sacrifice of Nightmares

activities.name: A Frame Job
activities.description: Travel deep into enemy territory, ambush the Red Legion, and trick them into retaliating against the Fallen.

activities.name: A New Frontier
activities.description: Explore the European Dead Zone as Devrim provides support from the church.

activities.name: Calling Them Home
activities.description: Hawthorne is broadcasting a message from the Farm to guide refugees. Help her amplify it to reach the entire region.

activities.name: Supply and Demand
activities.description: An old friend is looking for Red legion supplies to... reappropriate. Scour Fallen territory for anything to scavenge.

activities.name: Poor Reception
activities.description: The Fallen are trying to block all communications in the EDZ. Find the source of the interference and shut it down.

activities.name: Dark Alliance
activities.description: Red Legion Psions are meddling with forces best left alone. Investigate their connection to dark forces in the region.

activities.name: Getting Your Hands Dirty
activities.description: Seize upon the Taken invasion of the EDZ, direct their assault against the Red Legion, and end it before it gets out of control.

activities.name: Reversing the Polarity
activities.description: The Cabal tend to use a single technology to power everything in their arsenal. Take advantage of that design flaw to send them a message.

activities.name: Stop and Go
activities.description: Power generators in the Red Legion base are open to attack - but only for a short time. Speed into the subterranean complex and shut them down.

activities.name: Anti-Anti-Air
activities.description: Infiltrate the Red legion base and disable their network of flak turrets.

activities.name: Unsafe At Any Speed
activities.description: A nasty Fallen Pike gang is wreaking havoc in the area. Capture enemy vehicles and use them to even the odds.

activities.name: No Safe Distance
activities.description: The Red Legion base is full of explosives even more dangerous than usual. Find and neutralize them before they can enter the field.

activities.name: Red Legion, Black Oil
activities.description: Destroy the dark liquid that the Cabal use to power their technology or contaminate it, for a subtler approach.

activities.name: Thief of Thieves
activities.description: Recover the supplies that the Fallen have taken.

activities.name: Bad Neighbors
activities.description: Resolve a dangerous conflict between the Fallen and the Hive.

activities.name: Deathless
activities.description: Clear out the Knight that's keeping Sloane's crews from their work.

activities.name: Siren Song
activities.description: Disrupt a Hive Ritual to keep the Rig from sinking.

activities.name: Cliffhanger
activities.description: Asher has information about the Vex's next conversion site, and he wants it stopped.

activities.name: Postmodern Prometheus
activities.description: Ikora is reluctantly allowing Asher to explore a plan where he'd convert the Traveler's energy into a form of synthetic Light.

activities.name: Unexpected Guests
activities.description: Ikora's worried about some Taken emanations from beneath the moon's surface.

activities.name: Road Rage
activities.description: Asher's worked up about Vex interest in the Io Vault. He's got an unusual suggestion for how to deal with the problem.

activities.name: Arecibo
activities.description: Investigate a mysterious broadcast that only you and your Ghost can hear.

activities.name: Endless Branches
activities.description: Look into the differences of the various timelines generated by the Vex's Reality Engine.

activities.name: Bug in the System
activities.description: Corrupt a Vex data-harvesting operation by withstanding an onslaught of Hive.

activities.name: The Up and Up
activities.description: The Vex are simulating the Fallen's battle tactics. Breach into their simulations and eliminate the targets.

activities.name: The Runner
activities.description: The Vex has simulated a Cabal unit carrying important data within the forest. Track him down and defeat him.

activities.name: Vex Milk
activities.description: Ikora wants you to try and investigate the origins of the Vex by collecting special samples of their radiolarian fluid and transmitting it to Brother Vance.
